about_the_game:
Apartment 606 is a suspenseful horror and management game where survival hinges on more than just evading danger, you must also complete critical tasks to keep your job while managing unexpected challenges. Each night introduces new threats as you balance your work responsibilities with the growing terror around you. Spanning five nights, the game features cinematic sequences and story progression that slowly reveal the mystery behind your situation. The entire game takes place within the apartment, with multiple possible endings based on your choices.

THIS DEMO CONTAINS 2 OF THE 5 NIGHTS!



In this chilling survival horror game, you'll find yourself trapped in an apartment that feels increasingly sinister as the nights progress. The old camera system and an unreliable guard are your only allies against the unseen horrors lurking in the shadows.

Game Features
  • Mechanics: Master the camera system and a PC mini-game, all while feeling deceptively safe.
  • Increasing Terror: With each night, the danger escalates—from eerie glitches in the electronics to terrifying encounters that will test your courage.
